title: WordPress Is in Trouble
author: ulrischa
aiHeadline: WordPress Is in Trouble, and by Trouble, We Mean It's Probably Just Having a Midlife Crisis and Needs to Rebrand Itself as WordPress 2.0 or Something, But Seriously, What's Going On with the Most Popular CMS in the World?

title: The Origins of Wokeness
author: crbelaus
aiHeadline: The Origins of Wokeness: A Super Long and Winding Road That We're Not Entirely Sure About, But Apparently, It's Got Something to Do with Being Aware of Social Issues and Not Being a Total Jerk, According to This One Essay by Paul Graham

title: Debugging: Indispensable rules for finding even the most elusive problems (2004)
author: omkar-foss
aiHeadline: Debugging: Because Who Needs Sleep or a Social Life When You Can Spend Hours Trying to Find That One Pesky Error in Your Code, and These Indispensable Rules from 2004 Will Probably Help, But No Promises, Good Luck with That

title: How did they make cars fall apart in old movies (2017)
author: mgsouth
aiHeadline: The Magic of Making Cars Fall Apart in Old Movies: A Lost Art That Apparently Involved a Lot of Explosives, Skillful Editing, and a Prayer That the Stunt Driver Wouldn't Actually Get Hurt, But Hey, It Made for Some Great Action Scenes, Right?

title: AI Engineer Reading List
author: ingve
aiHeadline: The AI Engineer Reading List: Because If You Want to Survive in the Cutthroat World of Artificial Intelligence, You'd Better Be Willing to Read a Lot of Papers and Stay Up to Date on the Latest Developments, or You'll Be Left Behind, Probably to Be Replaced by a Robot or Something
